eu.tivian.musico.database

Class DatabaseSuggestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.musico.database.DatabaseSuggestion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NoCopySpan, TextWatcher, SimpleTextWatcher

    public class DatabaseSuggestion
extends Object
implements SimpleTextWatcher
    An autocomplete engine.

                          AutoCompleteTextView textView,
                          String table,
                          String column,
                          int limit)
        Creates the autocomplete engine.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context.
        textView - the target AutoCompleteTextView
        table - the target table.
        column - the target column in the table.
        limit - the number of suggestions to be displayed at once.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        private void update()
        Updates the suggestion list using the current text of textView.

      • update

        private void update(String text)
        Updates the suggestion list using the supplied text.
        Parameters:
        text - text on which the suggestions will be based.

      • query

        private Cursor query(String text)
        Query the database for the list of the suggestions.
        Parameters:
        text - text on which the suggestions will be based.
        Returns:
        the cursor with the list of the suggestions.

      • onTextChanged

        public void onTextChanged(CharSequence s,
                          int start,
                          int before,
                          int count)
        This method is called to notify you that, within s, the count characters beginning at start have just replaced old text that had length before.
        Specified by:
        onTextChanged in interface TextWatcher
        Parameters:
        s - the text.
        start - the index of first character changed.
        before - the length of the text before change occurred.
        count - number of changed characters.
